mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs C.S. Dobyns
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs C.S. Dobyns Offense: Assault and Battery and drawing a revolver Victim: Isaac L Livermore Complainant: R.L. Phillips Guilty: Fine $2.50, Court Cost: $2.50 Having paid fine and cost defendant was discharged from further prosecution Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.18.1887
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
